title: Low priority queue because of bug
body:
i have a 20 minute low priority queue because of the current "bug" going around that doesn't allow you to connect to games.
now i ain't that mad, but i think this is some bull**** 
i don't know why my computer is doing this, I've tried everything but i cant seem to change what is happening
someone help me please, there seems to be no fix :(

replies.body: What exactly happens when you try to open up a game?
